english name: A Game of Tag With the Lion Dance Robot
japanese name: 獅子舞ロボと鬼ごっこ
skill effect (japanese): 5秒間 スコアが100%UPする 自身を除き「ワンダーランズ×ショウタイム」メンバーを1人編成する毎にスコアが10%UPし、全員一致で更に10%UPする（最大150%)
skill effect (english): 100% score boost for 5 seconds. Gain additional +10% boost for every [Wonderlands×Showtime] card (except for themselves), and another +10% boost if all members are from the same unit (up to 150%).
gacha phrase: 鬼ごっこ、よーいドンっ☆
